1.content:
Alright! lets get cracking, who's gonna be our lead?

Elfuda - The covergirl of the series. Good natured, a little silly, constently trying, and failing, to loose weight. Is obsessed with French Fries.

Kuroeda - A dark elf and manager of a convenience store. She's sassy, flirty and sharp as a knife, Elfuda's polar opposite. Plagued by a huge ass.

Kusohanada - A dryad that runs a flower shop. She's very relaxed and plesant. Suffers from a severe lack of screen time.

Mero - A spritely Mermaid Fisherwoman. She loves swimming and seafood. Also doesn't get a lot of screen time.

If those don't grab you, we always have group B and C (Yes, there are a ton of characters)
1.title: Pick a character! Group A

11.content: Okay, now that we have our character picked, what type of story will this be?
11.title: Elfuda

12.content: Okay, now that we have our character picked, what type of story will this be?
12.title: Kuroeda

13.content: Okay, now that we have our character picked, what type of story will this be?
13.title: Kusohanada

14.content: Okay, now that we have our character picked, what type of story will this be?
14.title: Mero

15.content:
Okay, group B!

Oga: An Ogress who loves drinking and Sauna's. Surprisingly motherly and sweet. She has muscles, but also a beer belly.

Raika - A werewolf who instead of a normal human is a dog girl that can turn into a full dog. She's a big floofy derp and is super sweet. She tends to behave more like a dog than a wolf.

Oku - An Orc girl who was actually made fun of for being tiny. She lives in the human world now and swims recreationally.

Honeda - A skeleton (no, seriously), who can make herself look like she has skin via magic. She's silly and likes playing jokes.

If this still isn't enough, then let's go to Group C.
15.title: Group B

151.content: Okay, now that we have our character picked, what type of story will this be?
151.title: Oga

152.content: Okay, now that we have our character picked, what type of story will this be?
152.title: Raika

153.content: Okay, now that we have our character picked, what type of story will this be?
153.title: Oku

154.content: Okay, now that we have our character picked, what type of story will this be?
154.title: Honeda

155.content:
Alright! Group C! Since we've hit the end of my five slots, this is gonna get a lot smaller.

Gonda - A dragon girl. Somewhat short, she's very lazy and often doens't get up to do much other than scare the male lead due to a fear of Reptiles.

Hitome - A Cyclops, she and Oga have an inborn grudge against each other due to being titan family monsters. Other than that she's very kind and likes boxing.

Group D is next, and it contains the last two known characters...kinda
155.title: Group C

1551.content: Okay, now that we have our character picked, what type of story will this be?
1551.title: Gonda

1552.content: Okay, now that we have our character picked, what type of story will this be?
1552.title: Hitome

1553.content:
Group D! End of the road...kinda. I'll leave a Group E open, but so far this is it. Oh, and I'm leaving out the Hobbit Kobo because she looks like a ten year old and...yeah.

Ooeda - Elfuda's Aunt. She can be very strict and comes off cold, but it's really from a place of love. Also loves soft serve.

Satero - The closest thing to an antagonist thus far. She's a Satyr, though behaves like a succubus/MLP Changeling by feeding off characters love and desiers. She enjoys cooking and works at Not-Mcdonalds.

Group E...has been explained already.
1553.title: Group D

15531.content: Okay, now that we have our character picked, what type of story will this be?
15531.title: Ooeda

15532.content: Okay, now that we have our character picked, what type of story will this be?
15532.title: Satero

info.brief_description: Characters from Elf-san wa Yaserarenai (Elves don't diet!), in Omaly inspired interactive.
info.description:
Hey guys! This is my first interactive based on a manga I just discovered this year. Follow the cast of Elf-san wa Yaserarenai as they wind up expanding from things other than poor dieting habits! I hope you enjoy, and maybe check out the series as well.

Only things not allowed:
- Killing the main character
- No gross weight gain (Anything up to Morbid Obesity is okay, I'm just not a fan)
- Extreme time jumps (no jumping several months at one time. One month jump at most)

Try to keep chapters interesting and fair length, no excessively long or short. Around a paragraph is fair enough. Please spell things correctly and use good grammar.

I reserve the right to edit or remove chapters if they break rules or make no sense at all.
